title: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
description: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
OB: When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button, the dialog that appears does not have a default folder. Instead, it shows the desktop, my computer, etc., without providing a good default location. It would be better if the dialog defaulted to the default content location.
EB: It would be convenient if the import dialog remembered the last folder from which I imported a project.
SR: Modify the import dialog to include a default folder that points to the default content location. Additionally, add functionality to remember the last folder used for project import.
